com.iardelian.revives.manager

Class ReviveServiceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iardelian.revives.manager.ReviveServiceManager

  • public class ReviveServiceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Main managing class. Used to save and use ReviveServiceController and ServiceNotification settings. Trigger ReviveServiceNotifier interface when service starts and stops and provides service status checking.
    Author:
    Ivan Ardelian

        public void startService()
        Checks if service is already running in background and if not - start it. Also installs next service status check after a specified time
